video.title: 魔法科高校の劣等生
video.synopsis: Siblings Tatsuya and Miyuki enroll at Magic High School, where Miyuki's honors status comes between her and her underachieving older brother.

episodes.synopsis: A brother and sister enroll at the Magic High School. He's an underachiever known as a "Weed," while her talents place her in the "Bloom" category.
episodes.title: Enrollment Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The president of the student council asks Miyuki to join the student council. Miyuki says that her brother should also join them.
episodes.title: Enrollment Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is surprised by how quickly Tatsuya defeated Hattori in the duel. Meanwhile, Miyuki is having mixed emotions about her big brother.
episodes.title: Enrollment Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Mibu thanks Tatsuya for defusing the brawl between her and Kirihara and asks him to join their kendo team. But he's suspicious of her motives.
episodes.title: Enrollment Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya and the others are informed that the intruders are in the library -- and Mibu is with them. Can they stop them and find out what's going on?
episodes.title: Enrollment Part 6

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya has a plan to go after Blanche and take them on in battle. He leads the team to an abandoned factory where the people from Blanche are.
episodes.title: Enrollment Part 7

episodes.synopsis: As students prepare for the upcoming Nine Schools Competition, Tatsuya, facing skepticism, must prove himself worthy of the engineering squad.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya and Miyuki visit Four Leaves Technology, where a flying spell experiment is in progress, and Tatsuya unveils his flying CAD to a top engineer.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The bus carrying the students to the Nine Schools Competition is attacked by unknown forces, and Tatsuya suspects that it's the work of an insider.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Nine Schools Competition has finally started, and Tatsuya learns that the intruders from the previous night are with the No-Head Dragons.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 4

episodes.synopsis: During Women's Battle Board, Mari Watanabe has a suspicious accident and is taken to the Susono Base Hospital. Tatsuya helps her recover with magic.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 5

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Tatsuya's engineering skills, First High School players finish on the podium. What will Third High School do to beat First High School?
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 6

episodes.synopsis: When another suspicious accident happens at the Nine Schools Competition, the First High students think it was an act of sabotage.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 7

episodes.synopsis: As Tatsuya prepares to compete in Monolith Code, his formidable Third High School opponents scheme to force him into head-to-head combat.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 8

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya and his teammates have a strategy against Cardinal George and the Crimson Prince in Monolith Code, but have they underestimated their rivals?
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 9

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya remains vigilant as the No-Head Dragons decide to take even harsher actions to make sure that the Nine Schools Competition is called off.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 10

episodes.synopsis: As First High School students celebrate their victories in the Nine Schools Competition, Tatsuya, furious at the No-Head Dragons, pays them a visit.
episodes.title: Nine Schools Competition Part 11

episodes.synopsis: Fresh from his triumphs at the Nine Schools Competition, Tatsuya is asked to participate in the Thesis Competition as a member of the First High team.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Tatsuya's computer is hacked, he starts investigating and suspects that the attack has something to do with the upcoming Thesis Competition.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Erika offers to teach Leo a move that would be lethal against his enemies. Since they are taking the day off together, rumors start flying about them.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Tatsuya brings the relic to Four Leaves Technology; the Great Asian Alliance hacks the lab; someone snoops around Tatsuya's personal belongings.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 4

episodes.synopsis: The Thesis Competition is under way, and everyone is worried about the security for the event.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 5

episodes.synopsis: After terrorists attack the Thesis Competition, the students must draw on all their skills to survive.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 6

episodes.synopsis: The battle rages on after the attack on the Yokohama Conference Center. Students fight to make it to the shelter while forces battle on the streets.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 7

episodes.synopsis: Miyuki reveals the price her brother has to pay to use his extraordinary power. Tatsuya, meanwhile, makes use of a destructive weapon.
episodes.title: Yokohama Disturbance Part 8
